mapper.insert: insert into display_column (DISPLAY_COLUMN_ID, DISPLAY_COLUMN_NAME, DISPLAY_COLUMN_CODE,DISPLAY_COLUMN_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{displayColumnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{displayColumnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayColumnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayColumnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update display_column set DISPLAY_COLUMN_NAME = #{displayColumnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_COLUMN_CODE = #{displayColumnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISPLAY_COLUMN_TYPE = #{displayColumnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DISPLAY_COLUMN_ID = #{displayColumnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select DISPLAY_COLUMN_ID, DISPLAY_COLUMN_NAME, DISPLAY_COLUMN_CODE,DISPLAY_COLUMN_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from display_column where DISPLAY_COLUMN_ID = #{displayColumnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select DISPLAY_COLUMN_ID, DISPLAY_COLUMN_NAME, DISPLAY_COLUMN_CODE, DISPLAY_COLUMN_TYPE,STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from display_column

select DISPLAY_COLUMN_ID, DISPLAY_COLUMN_NAME, DISPLAY_COLUMN_CODE, DISPLAY_COLUMN_TYPE,STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from display_column where 1=1
and DISPLAY_COLUMN_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{displayName}),'%')
and DISPLAY_COLUMN_TYPE = #{displayType}
order by UPDATE_DATE desc

select DISPLAY_COLUMN_ID, DISPLAY_COLUMN_NAME, DISPLAY_COLUMN_CODE, DISPLAY_COLUMN_TYPE,STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from display_column where DISPLAY_COLUMN_NAME = #{displayName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
